short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: List of heros and villains and some exciting details about them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a fun heros and villains info extension. Search characters from Marvel, DC, Dark Horse and many others to find out interesting details about them.
